metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8076 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: The index_urlfetch function in index.c in Cyrus IMAP 2.3.x before 2.3.19, 2.4.x before 2.4.18, 2.5.x before 2.5.4 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information or possibly have unspecified other impact via vectors related to the urlfetch range, which triggers an out-of-bounds heap read.

criterions.comment: cyrus-imapd-2.4: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
